questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I'm keen on the mountains, specialy The Alpes. And my dream would be living there. I imagine the fixture and furniture in a pretty chalet or flat, front of a majestic vieuw. I often could walking in this marvelous scenary. Sometimes, friends and especcialy my children would come for some stays. They could be accomodated at our home, of course. I must be patient and keep hope. Time will tell us.
